hero.title: Bachelor's Degree in Mathematics-Computer Science
hero.subtitle: Cybersecurity and Network Administration Specialist
hero.description: Computer scientist with extensive experience in the technology sector since 2007, specialized in audits, network and systems administration, and cybersecurity.

about.heading: About Me
about.content: Computer professional with diverse skills and experience in the technology sector, active in IT since 2007. My career has been marked by diversity, from teaching computer science in elementary school to conducting audits, network and systems administration, ensuring the technological infrastructure necessary for organizational success.

jobs.title: Sorting and Transport Agent
jobs.description: Baggage transport, worker protection on ZRH airside, ZRH security, ZRH construction.

jobs.title: Construction Worker
jobs.description: Work on construction projects and infrastructure development.

jobs.title: Network Administrator
jobs.description: Management, optimization of networks and business systems. Implementation of computer security measures. Improvement and increase of operational efficiency.

jobs.title: Computer Security Specialist
jobs.description: Conducting cybersecurity audits and assessments. Identification and mitigation of vulnerabilities in information systems. Strengthening protection measures.

jobs.title: Computer Expert Detective
jobs.description: Work as computer expert, preparation of expert reports and testimonies in judicial processes.

jobs.title: Deputy IT Auditor
jobs.description: Conducting IT security audits for organizations, identifying critical vulnerabilities and providing solutions.

jobs.title: Elementary School Teacher
jobs.description: Implementation of innovative educational programs that integrated technology into teaching, resulting in a 20% increase in students' digital competence.
